variable.name: face
variable.description: Severity of acne on face (0=normal, 5= severe)

variable.name: nose
variable.description: Severity of acne on nose (0=normal, 5= severe)

variable.name: Currently Treated?
variable.description: Was the subject undergoing any prescription treatment for acne at the time of sampling?

variable.name: Current Treatment
variable.description: Which prescription treatment for acne was the subject undergoing at the time of sampling?

variable.name: Previously Treated?
variable.description: Had the subject previous undergone prescription treatment for acne?

variable.name: Previous Treatment
variable.description: Which prescription treatment for acne had the subject previously undergone?

variable.name: Days since LMP
variable.description: Days since first day of last menstrual cycle, at the time of sampling

variable.name: Hormonal Regulation
variable.description: Was the subject taking any medications affecting hormonal regulation at the time of sampling?

variable.name: Cosmetic procedures
variable.description: Any cosmetic procedures or treatments on the face undergone by the subject?
